description: Liam Harkmoore shows up at Alexander Greene's door to discuss matters about his sister. Alexander is in the middle of a workout in his garage when Liam accuses him of cheating on his sister. Liam is friends with the girl he's cheating with, and threatens to tell both girls unless Alexander breaks it off with his sister. Liam doesn't know what his sister sees in Alexander, so the jock decides to show him exactly what it is that makes her so crazy about him. He whips out his dick and shoves it in Liam's face, making him suck it until it's stiff. Alexander lays Liam down and starts kissing him, then he takes off his pants and underwear and the two guys rub their bulges together. Alexander sucks Liam's dick until he's horny enough to let the bigger guy fuck him. The two boys kiss while Alexander plows into Liam over and over on the mat. The guys work up a sweat fucking sideways until they both explode onto Liam's stomach.
title: Forbidden Encounters 2, Scene #04
